text: The Lagoa–Barra Highway (Portuguese:Autoestrada Lagoa–Barra), officially named Engenheiro Fernando Mac Dowell Highway, is a highway linking Gávea and Barra da Tijuca in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. The highway was opened in 1971. ==References== Category:Transport in Rio de Janeiro (city) Category:Highways in Rio de Janeiro (state)
title: Lagoa–Barra Highway
